name: Miskatonic University Library (Orne Library) [Erweiterung]
atmosphere: A cathedral of knowledge and silence. The air is cool and smells of aging paper and leather. Sunlight struggles to pierce the high, dusty windows.
details: The vast, echoing main reading room, where students whisper over their books.
The special collections desk, where one must request access to rare books.
The locked, iron-gated entrance to the restricted collection, where the most dangerous tomes are kept.
clues: Access to countless books on history, science, and folklore. The potential to read forbidden texts like the Necronomicon, at a great cost to sanity.
